thread.title: Watch: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan's sweet gesture for a fan
thread.title_full: Watch: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan's sweet gesture for a fan

author: Deccan
title: Watch: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan's sweet gesture for a fan
text:
Deccan Chronicle | September 30, 2015, 09.50 am Mumbai: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, who is all set to make her comeback to the big screen with Sanjay Gupta’s ‘Jazbaa’, has been busy promoting her film. The actress recently visited a city college to spread the word about her film, and interact with fans.
While promoting the film, Aishwarya met a visually impaired fan. The actress interacted with her and even ushered her to an area where they could speak to each other comfortably, away from the crowd.
They then posed for pictures, and shared stories. Now isn’t that a sweet gesture by the former Miss World?
‘Jazbaa’ also stars Irrfan Khan, however the actor is away from the country due to other work commitments, and has been unable to attend the film’s city promotions. The film will hit theatres on October 9.
Watch the video here:
